title: Magnetic field magnitude near two wires

content.question: Two long parallel wires are a distance 2a apart, as shown above. Point P is in the plane of the wires and a distance a from wire X. When there is a current I in wire X and no current in wire Y, the magnitude of the magnetic field at P is B0. When there are equal currents I in the same direction in both wires, the magnitude of the magnetic field at P is

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
